content: per 100 g in colorway love is love held double sample 2 pink cardiff cashmere classic dk 100% cashmere 112 m 122 yds per 25 g in shade 662 marylin sample 3 pale blue lamana verona light fingering 50% wool 30% silk 20% cashmere 180 m 197 yds per 25 g held together with 2 strands of lamana piura lace 100% alpaca 400 m 437 yds per 50 g both in shade 36 meters needed sample 1 rainbow approx 300 m 330 yds less than 1 skein approx 80 g sample 2 pink approx 1 ball of cardiff cashmere classic 112 m 122 yds sample 3 pale blue approx 1 ball of lamana verona and lamana piura each notions tapestry needle techniques norwegian cast-on optional faux i-cord edge increases m1r m1l decreases skpo k2tog standard bind-off lil scarf en________________________________________________________________________________3 abbreviations for a simple slip_stitch edge recommended k knit set-up row rs sl1 wyif k1 m1l k to last 3 sts skpo k1 k2tog knit 2 stitches together 1 st decreased row 1 ws sl1 wyif k2tog k to last 2 sts m1r k1 yo k1 m1l make one left left-leaning increase lift row 2 rs sl1 wyif slip the yo off the needle k1 m1l k loop between stitches from front knit to last 3 sts skpo k1 into back loop 1 st increased m1r make one right right-leaning increase for a faux i-cord edge lift loop between stitches from back knit set-up row rs k1 sl1 wyif k2 m1l k to last 5 sts k2tog into the front loop 1 st increased k1 sl1 wyif k1 rs right side of the work row 1 ws sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif skpo k to last 4 sts m1r skpo slip 1 stitch knitwise knit 1 stitch pass k1 yo sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif slipped stitch over 1 st decreased row 2 rs k1 sl1 wyif k1 slip the yo off the needle k1 sl1 wyif slip 1 stitch purlwise with yarn in front m1l k to last 5 sts k2tog k1 sl1 wyif k1 st s stitch es ws wrong side of the work both versions yo yarnover repeat row 1 and 2 until the yarn is used up or you reach your desired length make sure to have enough left for the bind-off row directions bind off using your favorite stretchy method sample 1 rainbow finishing 1 special hand-dyed skein fingering weight held double throughout pulling one strand from the outside and one weave in all ends gently soak and block your scarf using from the inside of the yarn ball blocking mats or a towel cast on 40 sts using norwegian cast-on sample 2 pink 1 ball of cardiff cashmere classic held single cast on 55 sts using norwegian cast-on sample 3 pale blue working with 3 strands of yarn throughout 1 strand of lamana verona and 2 strands of lamana piura pulled from the outside and inside of the ball cast on 70 sts using norwegian
